sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const Terms = () => { return ( <>

Our Terms and Conditions

Thank you for choosing to travel with us. Please find our terms and conditions below.

Cancellation policy

The company reserves the right to cancel tours when the minimum number of passengers is not met. Minimum number of passengers required is 6.

Cancellation Charges

When the customer cancels his/her reservation, the following terms and conditions apply:

One Day Tours

For cancellations made within 24 hours before departure, a 100% refund will be given.

Multi Day Tours

Cancellations must be made giving 7 days notice

); }; export default Terms;
